basic.description:
{Basic Offence}

Increases 10% melee damage and casts Bloodlust at battle opening for 10 rounds

advanced.description:
{Advanced Offence}

Increases 20% melee damage and casts Bloodlust at battle opening for 25 rounds

expert.description:
{Expert Offence}

Increases 30% melee damage and casts Bloodlust at battle opening for 50 rounds
